where is the triped base
--- Azure The Warrior <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> Belthassan stood up from the command chair of the Shadow Destiny.
> 
> Melchana:
> We have received a reply from lieutenant Daemos. He will be unavailable for 
> some time, he'll be attending some gladiator event or something. He was 
> trying to get an arrangement with Zardus, leader of the Alliance and said he 
> would recommend us to him.
> 
> Belthassan:
> Haha! Old friend! You haven't changed at all! Always trying to prove you are 
> the best! Well, for the Tripredacus and the Matrix, I widh you luck!
> 
> Melchana:
> Yeah, but maybe his mercenary act is going to get him killed... Too much 
> enemies means you never miss some fun, but sooner or later, he will be done 
> for good!
> 
> Gesper:
> So what do we do? Do we work for Zardus for some time?
> 
> Belthassan:
> Perhaps... (he thinks for a bit) Gesper, you will stay here to establish the 
> perimeter defenses. Get the shield online and reconfigure the surrounding 
> techno-organic vegetation so it can provide us with some defensive 
> firepower. Melchana, connect the shield's absoring devices to the Shadow 
> Destiny's generator. I'll be looking at the tactical emplacement of the base 
> and bring modifications to the orders I gave if need be. Gesper, if Zardus 
> sends a message, relay it to me in top priority. He is likely to be an ally 
> to us in this war. If he wants our assistance, I will go along with 
> Melchana.
> 
> The two others acknowledge their orders, Melchana hoping that Zardus will 
> call soon...
>
